variable.name: ADHVTYP
variable.description: Visit type for CaD adherence period

variable.name: ADHVY
variable.description: Visit year for CaD adherence period

variable.name: STARTDY
variable.description: Days from CT randomization to start of CaD adherence period
variable.comment: Days from original CT randomization to start of CaD adherence period.

variable.name: STCADDY
variable.description: Days from CaD randomization to start of CaD adherence period
variable.comment: Days from CaD randomization to start of CaD adherence period.

variable.name: ENDDY
variable.description: Days from CT randomization to end of CaD adherence period
variable.comment: Days from original CT randomization to end of CaD adherence period.

variable.name: ENDCADDY
variable.description: Days from CaD randomization to end of CaD adherence period
variable.comment: Days from CaD randomization to end of CaD adherence period.

variable.name: ADHRATE
variable.description: CaD medication adherence rate for the period

variable.name: COLLECT
variable.description: Was adherence collection performed during period
variable.comment: Were CaD pill bottles collected to allow adherence determination for period? If not, no adherence rate can be calculated.

variable.name: STOPCAD
variable.description: Participant inactive in CaD intervention during period
variable.comment: Was the participant inactive in the CaD intervention (i.e. not taking study pills) for all or part of the period.

variable.name: RESUMECAD
variable.description: Participant resumed CaD intervention during period
variable.comment: Did the participant resume CaD intervention (start taking study pills) during this period after having stopped?

variable.name: LOST
variable.comment: Did the participant have a status of lost-to-follow-up during all or part of this CaD adherence period?

variable.name: DEAD
variable.comment: Did the participant have a status of deceased during all or part of this CaD adherence period?
